publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1207 Dr Elaine Murray: Congratulations to the Solway Sharks-That the Parliament congratulates Dumfries and Galloway's ice hockey team, the Solway Sharks, on its victory in winning the 2004 Scottish Ice Hockey Association's Scottish Cup final.
S2M-1207 Congratulations to the Solway Sharks (lodged on 26 April 2004) Alex Fergusson*
S2M-1207 Congratulations to the Solway Sharks (lodged on 26 April 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Chris Ballance*, Scott Barrie*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Dr Jean Turner*, Phil Gallie*
S2M-1207 Congratulations to the Solway Sharks (lodged on 26 April 2004) David Mundell*, Pauline McNeill*

S2M-1207 Dr Elaine Murray: Congratulations to the Solway Sharks-That the Parliament congratulates Dumfries and Galloway's ice hockey team, the Solway Sharks, on its victory in winning the 2004 Scottish Ice Hockey Association's Scottish Cup final. Supported by: Alex Fergusson, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Chris Ballance, Scott Barrie, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Dr Jean Turner, Phil Gallie, David Mundell, Pauline McNeill
S2M-1207 Congratulations to the Solway Sharks (lodged on 26 April 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
